name: stockpiling of anode slime from electrorefining of copper, anode | stockpiling of anode slime from electrorefining of copper, anode | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11746/documentation

;Stockpiling is a way of assuring provision and control over supplies, and is systematically applied with some commodities by several countries.;;;This dataset describes the stockpiling of "anode slime, silver and tellurium containing, from refining of primary copper". Only the infrastructure for the storage tank is included by using as a proxy a storage tank for liquid organic chemicals. No losses are taken into account. The stockpiling is considered to happen in the geographical sourroundings of the mine producing the concentrate.;Sources:;-US Department of defense, 2013, Strategic and Critical Materials - Report on Stockpile Requirements.;-Reconfiguration of the National Defense Stockpile Report to Congress, April 2009.

The activity starts with the arrival of anode slime to the storage tank.

The activity ends with the provision of  the service of stockpiling the anode slime.
category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The storage does not consider infrastructre nor process losses.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: this stockpiling of anode slime is only considering infrastructure.

flow.name: stockpiling of anode slime from electrorefining of copper, anode
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

exchanges.description:
Density of anode slime is 1500 kg/m3 (http://minedewatering.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/Copper-process.pdf).
It is assumed that the storage of anode slime takes place as a continuous process and everyday a quantity of anode slime is pumpled from the storage tank for further processing . Therefore the capacity utilisation rate is assumed to be 1. (http://www.kennecott.com/library/media/Refining%202009.pdf)

It is roughly assumed that anode slime remains stored for 1 year. 
The lifetime of the liquid storage tank is given in ecoinvent as 50 years. The capacity of the tank is 4000 m3.

flow.name: liquid storage tank, chemicals, organics
